items.sentence: Tom adopted a cat from the local animal shelter.
Tom advised Mary not to leave her door unlocked.
Tom advised Mary to do that as soon as possible.
Tom advised Mary to take better care of herself.
Everyone looked at Tom like he\'d lost his mind.
Have you done everything we\'ve asked you to do?
Let\'s just hope we don\'t have to use our guns.
Let\'s not waste any more of each other\'s time.
How many times do you wash your hands every day?
How many years has it been since I last saw you?
